tool_description: Quickly retrieve original Arabic text, translation, transliteration and Word Search from the Koran /Quran
title: Al-Quran

api_list.name: Get range of verses
api_list.description: Responds with a collection of *Ayahs/Verses* in a specific *Chapter/Surah* along with original Arabic text, translation, transliteration and verse ID in JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/{chapterid}/{range}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you retrieve verses 5 to 10 from chapter 2 of the Quran?
Please get verses 1 to 7 from chapter 18.
I need verses 3 to 8 from chapter 36.
Could you fetch verses 10 to 15 from chapter 55?
Retrieve verses 2 to 6 from chapter 112.
Show me verses 1 to 5 from chapter 67.
Get verses 4 to 9 from chapter 24.
Please retrieve verses 6 to 12 from chapter 48.
Can you fetch verses 1 to 3 from chapter 93?
I need verses 7 to 10 from chapter 76.

api_list.name: Get base information
api_list.description: Responds with JSON including some properties of the Quran. *(deprecated)*
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

Find the word 'Rahman' in the Quran and show its occurrences.
Provide the Arabic text and translation of Ayah 18 from Surah Al-Kahf.
What does Ayah 286 of Surah Al-Baqarah say in English?
Can you transliterate Surah An-Nas for me?
Search for the word 'Salah' in the Quran and list its occurrences.
Give me the original Arabic text of Surah Al-Mulk.
What is the translation of Ayah 1 from Surah Al-Fajr?

api_list.name: Get entire Surah/Chapter
api_list.description:
Possible values: ***1-114*** 
Responds with entire Surah/Chapter of the Koran including all verses in the Surah and some additional information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/{chapterid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: chapterId
parameters.description:
Represents a unique Surah/Chapter in the Koran.
**Min Value: *1***
**Max Value: *114***

utterances.utterance: Can you retrieve the entire text of Surah Al-Fatiha?
Please get the full chapter of Surah Al-Baqarah.
I need the complete Surah Al-Imran.
Retrieve the entire Surah An-Nisa for me.
Could you fetch the full text of Surah Al-Ma'idah?
Show me the complete Surah Al-An'am.
Get the entire Surah Al-A'raf.
I want to see the full chapter of Surah Al-Anfal.
Retrieve the complete Surah At-Tawbah.
Can you get the entire Surah Yunus?

api_list.name: Get specific Ayah/Verse
api_list.description: Responds with a specific *Ayah/Verse* in a specific *Chapter/Surah* along with original Arabic text, translation, transliteration and verse ID in JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/{chapterid}/{verseid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: chapterId
parameters.description:
Refers to a *Surah/Chapter* in the Koran
**Min Value: *1***
**Max Value: *114***

parameters.name: verseId
parameters.description: A valid *Ayah/verse* number from a specific chapter from the Quran

utterances.utterance: Can you retrieve verse 5 from chapter 2 of the Quran?

Can you fetch verse 35 from chapter 24 of the Quran?
Retrieve verse 6 from chapter 112 of the Quran.

api_list.name: Search for a word in Quran
api_list.description: Looks for a given keyword (English) in ***translation_eng*** key in the entire Koran and responds with all the verses containing the given keyword and toal matches in JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/corpus/{searchterm}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Any given keyword or phrase you like to search for in the Koran
